title: Surrey's ancient and once famous town that now barely even exists
description: Historians described what is now barely a hamlet as once being a "famous town" in the county

title: Rati Organics Launches Natural Rose Water Crafted with Ancient Ayurvedic Wisdom
description: New Delhi [India], December 19: There’s something quietly powerful about traditions that survive centuries. They don’t shout for attention. They don’t change with trends. They simply work. Rati Organics, a newly launched Ayurvedic-inspired personal care brand, is built on that very belief. With its debut product, Rati Organics Natural Rose Water 100 ML, the brand [...]

title: Teen Falconer in Kazakhstan Preserves Ancient Hunting Arts
description: The Astana Times provides news and information from Kazakhstan and around the world.ASTANA — In eastern Kazakhstan, 15-year-old Aizere Markskyzy is continuing a centuries-old tradition of falconry, working with golden eagles and Kazakh tazy dogs as part of her family’s heritage. Raised in a lineage of hunters, she is already competing, training animals and planning how to preserve national hunting arts for future generations. She lives in...The post Teen Falconer in Kazakhstan Preserves Ancient Hunting Arts appeared first on The Astana Times.

title: AFCON, Total Energies and football's problematic links to fossil fuel
description: The energy company’s sponsorship is a reminder of how football feels morally compromised on environmental issues

title: Ancient sword dance tradition will return on Boxing Day to North East
description: The Redcar Sword Dancers will uphold a historic tradition this Boxing Day with their 59th annual Greatham sword dance, performed at 12pm outside the hospital gates.
